Purpose: To standardize and perform accurate testing of Apolipoprotein A1 (Apo A1) and Apolipoprotein B (Apo B) in serum samples, ensuring consistent and reliable result reporting.
Equipment: Automated immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Roche Cobas 8000), centrifuge, vortex mixer, refrigerated storage (2-8°C), freezer (-20°C to -70°C)
